comment.author: 71423829@N00
comment._content: I think this bridge is Bridge Street in the Broomielaw area of the city.

comment.author: 42875509@N00
comment._content: I think so too, you can see the railway bridge to the left. I hadn't realised this bridge was just called 'Glasgow Bridge' Glasgow Bridge on council website

comment.author: 34997905@N03
comment._content:
Thanks to both of you for the identification!

Will investigate and update as apporpriate.

comment.author: 28118170@N05
comment._content: Correct, Glasgow Bridge. The street connecting from the North is Jamaica Street and the one leading South ( out of the right of the picture is Bridge Street ( I have added notes ) The bridge to the left carries trains in and out of Glasgow Central Station.

comment.author: 76771735@N00
comment._content: I'm from Glasgow and it's more commonly known as Jamaica Bridge.
